Plot: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job to work in New York City for a high-end law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.
Title: The Devil's Advocate
Writer: Andrew Neiderman (novel), Jonathan Lemkin (screenplay), Tony Gilroy (screenplay)
Actors: Keanu Reeves, Al Pacino, Charlize Theron, Jeffrey Jones
tomatoConsensus: Though it is ultimately somewhat undone by its own lofty ambitions, The Devil's Advocate is a mostly effective blend of supernatural thrills and character exploration.
